title: MySQLSPACE()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLSPACE()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return a string with 10 space characters:
SELECT 
  SPACE(10);

Definition and Usage
The SPACE() function returns a string of the specified number of space 
characters.
Syntax
SPACE(
number
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
number
Required. The number of space characters to return
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0

★
+1
